analysis.description:
Reentrancy in AirDropContract.collectAirDropTokenBack (/unique_chucks/1/0x3cd9024168e6240b4f18b466d9bea9f8efc66004.sol#151-167):
	External calls:
	- tokenRewardContract.transfer(collectorAddress,totalAirDropToken * 1e18) (/unique_chucks/1/0x3cd9024168e6240b4f18b466d9bea9f8efc66004.sol#159-163)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalAirDropToken (/unique_chucks/1/0x3cd9024168e6240b4f18b466d9bea9f8efc66004.sol#164-165)

AirDropContract.fallback (/unique_chucks/1/0x3cd9024168e6240b4f18b466d9bea9f8efc66004.sol#93-105) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenRewardContract.transfer(msg.sender,amount * 1e18) (/unique_chucks/1/0x3cd9024168e6240b4f18b466d9bea9f8efc66004.sol#101-104)

AirDropContract.collectAirDropTokenBack (/unique_chucks/1/0x3cd9024168e6240b4f18b466d9bea9f8efc66004.sol#151-167) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenRewardContract.transfer(collectorAddress,airDropTokenNum * 1e18) (/unique_chucks/1/0x3cd9024168e6240b4f18b466d9bea9f8efc66004.sol#156-159)
	-tokenRewardContract.transfer(collectorAddress,totalAirDropToken * 1e18) (/unique_chucks/1/0x3cd9024168e6240b4f18b466d9bea9f8efc66004.sol#159-163)
Parameter '_tokenRewardContract' of AirDropContract. (/unique_chucks/1/0x3cd9024168e6240b4f18b466d9bea9f8efc66004.sol#80-81) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_collectorAddress' of AirDropContract. (/unique_chucks/1/0x3cd9024168e6240b4f18b466d9bea9f8efc66004.sol#82) is not in mixedCase
